inscription:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [004402 / All]
life_date: Félix Buhot, French, 1847–1898; After Gustave-Adolphe Jundt, French, 1830–1882
provenance: [Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2008; sold in April for PKOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2008-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA]
signed: bottom center, in the plate: [Felix Buhot SC]; LRC, in the print: [G Jundt]
title: On the Thread of the Water
